name: Dino X Cherry
description:
Hello there!

Thanks for playing this game. This is my first game develop experience. I stole the game idea from Hivermind by Demberg. However i will try to come up with my own level design (the most difficult part so far to me). There are just 6 levels, the game will crash if you try to play the 7th.  There are still pretty much things to do to complete this game. Please share your thoughts about this game so that i can improve it. 

How to play

- Use W, A, S, D or ARROW KEYS to move or SWIPE to move if you're playing on a phone. R to quick level reload

 Help these 2 dinos stay away from the cliff and  get them to the cherry at the same time.

Credits

- Thanks Arks for those cute dinos.

- TIles texture are come from https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-terrain-repack

- Soundtrack: Bossa and Joy by Zakiro101
